revised_title: Herbert McLean Evans: A Pioneering Endocrinologist and Anatomist
tldr: Herbert McLean Evans was a prominent anatomist, embryologist, and endocrinologist born in 1882 in California. His life and career were marked by significant contributions to the field of endocrinology and a strong influence on the development of medical research during the first half of the twentieth century. Evans's work and personal life were shaped by his family's medical background and his own passion for science and literature.
